verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
At night I laid in bed, and I began to cry
And my mind just failed to know exactly why
I can't explain with tongue or pen
The Spirit is groaning deep within
It must be God here in my soul
Cause I feel the pull.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I feel the pull
I hear the call
And His Spirit's moving me
To give my all
He speaks to me
And I agree
Lord please come and take control
I feel the pull

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I went to hear the Word
And with each line and phrase
Oh, He was drawing me to give a higher praise
There is a deep, calling to the deep
Like a great magnet pulling me
I know for sure That I reach the goal
Cause I feel the pull
